mapper.insert: insert into LikePlace(pid, peid, l_image, l_desc, p_location, l_like, l_flag, l_date) values(#{pid}, #{peid}, #{l_image}, #{l_desc}, #{p_location}, 0, 0, now());
mapper.select: select lid, uid, l_like, l_image, l_desc, l_date from LikePlace where p_location=#{p_location} and po_flag=0 order by l_date desc;
select lid, uid, l_like, l_image, l_desc, l_date from LikePlace where p_location=#{p_location} and po_flag=0 order by l_like desc;
select pid from Place where p_location=#{p_location} and p_flag=0 order by p_like desc limit 5;
